headline: Verizon Communications (NYSE:VZ) To Redeem US$985 Million Notes Due 2026 As Stock Remains Flat
summary: Verizon Communications (NYSE:VZ) recently announced plans to redeem $984 million in notes, a move aimed at optimizing its debt profile, which aligns with its strategic financial management. Over the last quarter, Verizon's share price rose by 9%, supported by strong fourth-quarter earnings with increased revenue and a notable turnaround in net income from a prior loss to a significant profit. Additionally, its quarterly dividend announcement likely reinforced investor confidence. The...

headline: These Were the 2 Top-Performing Stocks in the Dow Jones Industrial Average in February 2025
summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJINDICES: ^DJI) index dropped 1.6% in February.  Although some blue chip stocks slumped by double-digit percentages, 50% of its 30 constituents beat the index last month.  Coca-Cola (NYSE: KO) and Verizon Communications (NYSE: VZ) were the two top-performing Dow stocks in February, gaining 12.2% and 9.4%, respectively.
